english.segment1: boys speak in rhythm, and girls in code. tell it to me straight, give it to me now. face forward, face forward
english.segment2: you're speaking foreign language (nothing I can translate). you're speaking foreign language (nothing I can dictate). you're speaking foreign language (nothing I can translate). you're speaking foreign language
english.segment3: boys speak in rhythm, and girls just lie. tell me how you feel, come out of the dark. and we can head back home and I'll know where to start
english.segment4: you're speaking foreign language (nothing I can translate). you're speaking foreign language (nothing I can dictate). you're speaking foreign language (nothing I can translate). you're speaking foreign language
english.segment5: where did we go wrong. we need medication for this miscommunication. where did we wrong. our conversations weaken
english.segment6: boys speak in rhythm and girls in code. boys speak in rhythm and girls just lie
